mapper.select:
SELECT tk_ticket_plan_item.* FROM tk_ticket_plan_item WHERE 1=1
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{id},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.ticket_plan_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ticketPlanId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentNumber},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentCode},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentName},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_unit LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentUnit},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.equipment_spec LIKE CONCAT('%',#{equipmentSpec},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.warehouse_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{warehouseId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.warehouse_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{warehouseName},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.wh_warehouse_area_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{whWarehouseAreaId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.wh_warehouse_area_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{whWarehouseAreaName},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.wh_warehouse_slot_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{whWarehouseSlotId},'%')
AND tk_ticket_plan_item.wh_warehouse_slot_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{whWarehouseSlotName},'%')
